headline: Is Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) Fairly Priced After Recent Life Sciences Demand Headlines
summary: If you are wondering whether Thermo Fisher Scientific at around US$618.72 is offering fair value or a stretched price, this article is designed to walk you through the key signals. The stock has been relatively stable over the last 7 days, while posting a 10.0% return over 30 days, 4.4% year to date and 10.9% over 1 year, with a 5.2% return across 3 years and 21.8% over 5 years.
